attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i maried with my husband a year ago,and i am still in pakistan with him,my husband visa refused because visa officier said i am non muslim and english lady,so being english and christian not accepted for her,is this govt policy to discriminate peoples of their religion and insult as being english,is this mean they are above the law and no body ask them any thing,i feel so shamefull about their behaviour with peoples,it shows declining of our society,that use religion to refused peoples,i am victim of them,i want to spread my message all over that they are very racist and low standard qualified peoples there

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
